text: The Road to the Wall is a 1962 American short documentary film produced by Robert Saudek about the construction of the Berlin Wall. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== * List of American films of 1962 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1962 films Category:1962 short films Category:1962 documentary films Category:1960s in Berlin Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:Berlin Wall Category:English-language films Category:Documentary films about historical events Category:Documentary films about Berlin Category:Short documentary films
title: The Road to the Wall
